requirement.p:
For audits of NYSE listed entities, NYSE rules require that the audit committee obtain and review:
NYSE Corporate Governance Rules – Section 303A
At least annually, a report from us describing our firm’s quality control procedures
A report from us describing any material issues raised by the most recent internal quality control review or peer review of the firm, or any inquiry or investigation by governmental or professional authorities, within the preceding five years, in respect of one or more independent audits carried out by the firm, and any steps taken to deal with such issues
At least annually, a report from us describing all relationships between us and the entity.

paras.p: We refer to the Audit committee supplemental topics for our most recent report on quality control for audit committees and other stakeholders when communicating to those charged with governance our firm’s quality control procedures and material issues regarding the quality of our practice within the preceding five years.
